reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pub Social' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Social' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Social' check box is checked.
Enter 'Pub Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Post' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Post' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Click the 'Facebook Apps' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Drupal for Facebook dialog'.
Click the 'Edit' link.
Switch to the active frame titled '6f59e4589d654f9 dialog'.
Click the 'Delete' button.
Click the 'Delete' button.
Click the 'Delete' button.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Facebook Apps' menu link.
Click the 'Add App' menu link.
Enter '509d4a4e331f4ec' in the 'Label' text box.
Enter '125235334322205' in the 'Facbook app id' text box.
Enter 'a9b07339789b4ea75b3951f81fe27def' in the 'Secret' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Created facebook application Publisher 7 Test App (509d4a4e331f4ec).' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Facebook Apps' menu link.
Click the 'Stream Posts' menu link.
Click the 'Post via pub 7' link.
Enter 'publisher_rifassi_user@tfbnw.net' in the 'Username' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Facebook login' button.
Verify warning message 'Generated a new access token, but not yet saved. Remember to press the save button below!' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Show current token' link.
Copy the current token.
Paste the current token into the 'Paste Access token' text area.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'Facebook' menu link.
Check the 'Post' checkbox.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Enter '4c108f0d507e4eb' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 4c108f0d507e4eb has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Revisions' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Revisions dialog'.
Click the 'Edit' extend menu button.
Click the 'Share' menu button.
Click the 'Facebook' link.
Check the 'Post to facebook wall' check box.
Enter 'fb7b41fd8ca24ff' in the 'Provide brief message' text area.
Click the 'Share' button.
Verify the text 'Publisher Seven Test User' is present on the page.
Verify the text '4c108f0d507e4eb' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Publisher 7 Test App' is present on the page.
